File /std/room/newspaper_subscription.c

Newspaper subscription room This room handles subscriptions for one specific newspaper.

See also:
/obj/handlers/newspaper.c and help:subscription_room.c

Written by Wirble

Started August 2001

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/basic_room.c

This class includes the following files /include/mail.h, /include/player_handler.h, /include/move_failures.h, /include/shops/bank.h, /include/room/newspaper.h and /include/money.h

set_money_place
